sentence: Shortly after former President Trump announced his endorsement of celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz in the hotly contested Pennsylvania Senate GOP primary, a slew of Trumpworld figures fired up social media with their apparent disapproval of the former president’s new endorsee to replace retiring Sen. Pat Toomey (R-PA).
author: Matt Shuham
title: ‘Romney 2.0': Trumpworld Implodes Over Ex-POTUS’ Endorsement Of Dr. Oz

sentence: (Newser) – Over the weekend, former President Trump endorsed Mehmet Oz—better known to Americans as Dr. Oz—in the GOP Senate primary in Pennsylvania.
author: John Johnson
title: Trump's Dr. Oz Endorsement Is Proving Controversial

sentence: He’s endorsed Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary and South Dakota Governor Kristi Noem.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Trump To Ron DeSantis: Just Do Me A Favor Though

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz The last time we checked in on Donald Trump's endorsement of celebrity healther Dr. Mehmet Oz for Pennsylvania's open Senate seat, right-wingers from Roger Stone to former OANN anchors were blasting the move.
title: Strike two: Trump's Oz endorsement quickly turning into his second disaster in Pennsylvania

sentence: He criticized Trump's endorsement of physician and TV personality Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania's GOP primary Senate race earlier this month.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump Ally Roger Stone Demands 'RINO' McCarthy Resign After Leaked Audio
